casebody.data:
Sheila MARTELLO, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Robert A. FRANCO, Esq. and Randi K. Franco, Esq., Defendants-Petitioners,
and
Franco & Franco, Attorneys at Law, et al., Defendants. Sheila Martello, Plaintiff,
v.
Robert A. Franco, Esq., et al., Defendants,
and
Todd Siegmeister, Defendant. C-99 September Term 2018
080533 Supreme Court of New Jersey. SEPTEMBER 28, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-0698/0858-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
